required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of ly011 Cell Injection in the Treatment of Advanced Gastric Adenocarcinoma
clinical_study.official_title: to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of LY011 Cell Injection（Targeting CLDN 18.2 Chimeric Antigen Receptor T Cells） in the Treatment of Advanced Gastric Adenocarcinoma

collaborator.agency: The Affiliated Hospital of Xuzhou Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: Objective to evaluate the safety and efficacy of ly011 cell injection in the treatment of advanced gastric adenocarcinoma.

primary_outcome.description: MTD determination will based on the incidence of reported adverse events (including dose-limiting toxicities) and abnormal laboratory test results.

secondary_outcome.description: the proportion of patients with best overall response of complete response (CR) or partial response (PR), as per local investigator´s assessment and according to Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST) version 1.1 criteria

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the curve from time 0 to the last time point (AUC0-t)
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the curve from time 0 to the last time point for serum CAR-T cells
Apparent clearance for serum CAR-T cells
Maximum concentration for serum CAR-T cells

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the serum concentration-time curve (AUC0-inf)
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the serum concentration-time curve for serum CAR-T cells
Time to maximum concentration for serum CAR-T cells
Terminal elimination rate constant for serum CAR-T cells

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the curve above baseline of ANC [ANC_AUC(0-tlast)]
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the curve above baseline of ANC for serum CAR-T cells

facility.name: The Affiliated Hospital of Xuzhou Medical University
